title: FreePBX security advisory (AV25–831)
description: On December 9, 2025, FreePBX published a security advisory to address a critical vulnerability in the following products:
products: FreePBX Security-Reporting framework (FreePBX 16/17)   versions 16.0.44 and prior
FreePBX Security-Reporting framework (FreePBX 16/17)   versions 17.0.23 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
